title: Client Shows reconnect after my game has finished
body: So, i finished a game the enemy team destroyed the nexus, i click continue then it goes to the client but says reconnect. I've tried restarting my pc and also closing and reopening the client. Anyone know how to fix

replies.body: Same thing happened now on all 3 of my accounts, let me play OCE ffs
Is this happening after you finish a game, or does it happen even if you haven't played on that account today?

> [{quoted}](name=Agent Mindstar,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=rxrxEVVf,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-09-26T00:19:29.276+0000)
>
> Is this happening after you finish a game, or does it happen even if you haven't played on that account today?

For me, it happened after I finished a game
Happens after I finish a game, I just kept swapping accounts till I ran out of them.

Thanks!

We're still trying to find the cause, but will let you know as soon as we find anything.

Cheers
Mindstar

heads up, it isnt just people who are finishing games, its also people trying to log in, i went to the shop and left my client open at the home page when i got back i tried to start a ranked que and got a error 3 times, so i reloged now it saying im in game and cant connect at all
i heard you guys were gonna give everyone the black alistar skin after this...awww, riot..you guys are so sweet ;)
BUMP, same thing has happend to me...
Bump this, having the same issue
Mine's working now, i haven't tried to log in for about half an hour so it could have been up before then. Just about to que up now. I'll keep you posted on how i go after the game. Ty riot
nah man, just plain skin
yeah, its just ghost gaming. longest blitz game of my life...i havent landed a hook in almost 2 hours
wait. Did u have the red blitzcrank?

This is happening to me atm i tried pressing the reconnect but it puts me into a black screen and says some connection error ive checked my brothers account's perspective if i hover into my account name it simply says "Ahri" while ingame (note: ahri was on my last game before this happened") ive tried restarting pc, the client it simply puts me back to the non-exitant game and again shows the connection error message.

Also ive tryed to log in on a different computer and it still does the same exact thing.

-ItsCharles16
-Diamond1307 (my brother)

https://prnt.sc/gpph14 (Diamond1307's perspective)
http://prntscr.com/gppheh (error message after i press reconnect)
http://prntscr.com/gpphma (my perspective after i opened league and after pressing cancel on the error message)

yeah, im on discord with some people now who can play...its only bugged for a few of us....i just wished i invited my mates into the game i played so they would be stuck in the same boat as me....feels bad
Some people are able to finish and go into another game but some people cant.
Same issue here

Angry reacts only ty
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

Only after i finished, it took a few more seconds than usual to go to post game stats. so i pressed skip to stats, then it just bugged out like i disconnected and after a while came up with the reconnect button
Thanks for reporting this guys.  We're checking it out now.  Stand by!
xoxox, someone in the opposing team from my last game has the same issue aye..3 people at the same time. It's a conspiracy!!
lmao, dude same thing is happening to me...you must have posted this as i was typing out my post...surely two in a row will get us some sort of help.
I'm stuck in a ghost game too :(. It happened after we finished the game and I'm pretty sure everyone on both teams are stuck too.
